game.name: Fire City Truck Rescue Driving Simulator
game.description:
There are only a few online games where you get a chance to help others and become a hero. Here we have brought to you a brand new adventure challenge where you can compete several vital rescue missions to get awarded with a tag of a â€œhero.â€ Would you like to try it out right away? Join Fire City Truck Rescue Driving Simulator and be prepared to play the role of a firefighter! You would have multiple buildings and vehicles to rescue here.

Choose your firefighter truck and get ready to take care of multiple exciting and challenging rescue missions! Use your brain power and plan for a strategy to perform different rescue missions in this one of the best HTML5 running games! Hey! The good news is that you will get some points for completing your every mission. Do not forget to unlock the latest trucks with the help of the points you earned along the way. Find flyovers, hours, highways, skyscrapers and everything along with a reality-based map!

It gives you a feeling of proud when you accomplish a mission by driving an awesome fire truck. Good luck to experience the matchless fire emergencies that you have never seen before in your life in this 3D fire truck driving simulator! Rescue buildings, civilians and vehicles that are struggling against the deadly fire! Good luck to reach out safely at the spot on foot with the fire hose and get the job done fast before something goes wrong! Use your fire fighting skills to protect the city from disaster in this free rescue game!
